title: Dusty Baker Has Managed in Two of Three Postseason No-Hitters
description: Manager Dusty Baker has been in a dugout for two of Major League Baseball’s three postseason no-hitters: Roy Halladay’s in 2010 and the Astros’ combined effort in Game 4.
dc:creator: James Wagner
media:description: Manager Dusty Baker needed a win on Wednesday and his Houston Astros delivered in a big way.
